## Task 3
```{r}
with(spruce, plot(Height, BHDiameter, pch=21, bg="Blue", main = "Scatter Plot of BHDiameter vs Height"), xlim=c(0,1.1 * max_x), ylim = c(0, 1.1 * max_y))
```

<!--
spruce$Height, spruce$BHDiameter can also be used in trendscatter
-->

```{r}
library(s20x)

layout(matrix(1:3))

trendscatter(BHDiameter~Height, data=spruce, f=0.5)

trendscatter(BHDiameter~Height, data=spruce, f=0.6)

trendscatter(BHDiameter~Height, data=spruce, f=0.7)
```

```{r}
layout.show(4)
```
